1002.short_description: Could not find Miiverse on your console
1002.long_description:
***Note:*** This error relates to the Martini patches, which are now deprecated.

The patcher could not find a Miiverse applet installed on your console, or you have several Miiverses installed.
1002.long_solution: If missing Miiverse and are on a retail unit, reinstall Miiverse (NAND backup). If you have multiple Miiverse titles installed, or are missing Miiverse on non-retail hardware, get in touch with a developer in our [Discord](https://discord.gg/pretendo) - we'd love to know what kind of devkit you have!
